i1.name: Petricite Burst
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Casting an [[champion ability|ability]] grants an ''Unshackled'' stack for 4 seconds, with the duration refreshing on subsequent ability uses. '''Sylas''' can have up to three ''Unshackled'' stacks at a time. While '''Sylas''' has stacks of ''Unshackled'', he gains {{as|{{sti|80% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.

{{sbc|Unshackled:}} '''Sylas' '''next basic attack is modified to whirl his chains around him, becoming {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable}}, dealing {{as|130% AD}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to his primary target and {{as|40% AD}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to nearby secondary targets and consuming an ''Unshackled'' stack.
Damage to secondary targets executes {{tip|minion|minions}} {{as|'''below''' 25 health}}.

''The empowered attack applies [[on-hit effect]]s to the primary target but disables '''Sylas' '''{{tip|critical strike|critical strikes'}} '''bonus''' damage. [[Spell effects]] only apply to secondary targets.''
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Casting an champion ability grants an Unshackled stack for 4 seconds, with the duration refreshing on subsequent ability uses. Sylas can have up to three Unshackled stacks at a time. While Sylas has stacks of Unshackled, he gains 80% bonus attack speed.
Unshackled: Sylas' next basic attack is modified to whirl his chains around him, becoming unstoppable, dealing 130% AD (+ 25% AP) magic damage to his primary target and 40% AD (+ 20% AP) magic damage to nearby secondary targets and consuming an Unshackled stack.
Damage to secondary targets executes minions below 25 health.
The empowered attack applies on-hit effects to the primary target but disables Sylas' critical strikes' bonus damage. Spell effects only apply to secondary targets.
i1.notes:
* {{ii|Sheen|Spellblade}} damage will get converted to magic damage but will deal its damage only to the primary target.
* Hitting a target multiple times with ''Petricite Burst'' will not add additional stacks of {{ri|Electrocute}} or {{ri|Phase Rush}}.
* ''Petricite Burst'' does not add stacks of {{ri|Press the Attack}} to the target.
* ''Petricite Burst'' can be {{tip|dodge|dodged}}, {{tip|block|blocked}}, or missed while '''Sylas''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} as the primary target but not as a secondary target.

q1.name: Chain Lash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sylas''' lashes out two lines that converge to the target location and extend beyond it up to a maximum range, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

After a {{fd|0.6}}-second delay, the chains' intersection detonates, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within. Against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}} the detonation deals 60% reduced damage.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sylas lashes out two lines that converge to the target location and extend beyond it up to a maximum range, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies hit for 1.5 seconds.
After a 0.6-second delay, the chains' intersection detonates, dealing magic damage to enemies within. Against minions and monsters the detonation deals 60% reduced damage.
leveling:
{{st|Detonation Damage|{{ap|60 to 280}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}|Non-Champion Detonation Damage|{{ap|60*0.4 to 280*0.4}} {{as|(+ 32% AP)}}}}
{{st|Maximum Champion Damage|{{ap|40+60 to 120+280}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}}|Maximum Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|40+60*0.4 to 120+280*0.4}} {{as|(+ 72% AP)}}}}
q1.notes: * ''Chain Lash'' is always cast from the original casting position.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)

  • Slow: %

• Detonation Damage: (+ 80% AP)
  • Non-Champion Detonation Damage: (+ 32% AP)

  • Maximum Champion Damage: (+ 120% AP)
  • Maximum Non-Champion Damage: (+ 72% AP)

w1.name: Kingslayer
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sylas''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the front of the target enemy's location and, upon arrival, he strikes them to deal {{as|magic damage}}.

If ''Kingslayer'' damaged an enemy {{tip|champion}}, '''Sylas''' is also {{tip|heal|healed}}, increased by {{as|{{pp|type='''Sylas'''' '''missing''' health|key=%|0 to 100 for 11|key1=%|0 to 60|formula=1% per 0.6% of Sylas' '''missing''' health}}|health}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sylas dashes to the front of the target enemy's location and, upon arrival, he strikes them to deal magic damage.
If Kingslayer damaged an enemy champion, Sylas is also healed, increased by 0 to 60 â€’ undefined.
w1.notes:
* The damage will be dealt if the dash completed uninterrupted, and regardless of how far the target's location is at the end of the dash.
** The only exception is if the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, in which case ''Kingslayer'' will have no effect.

effects.str:
• Heal: (+ 50% AP)
  • Maximum Heal: (+ % AP)

r1.name: Hijack
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sylas''' launches his chains towards the target enemy {{tip|champion}} to gain a copy of their [[champion ability|ultimate ability]]. '''Sylas''' cannot select the same champion again for a set duration, and can hold the ''hijacked'' ultimate for 90 seconds, during which he can recast ''Hijack''.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Sylas''' can cast his hijacked ultimate ability at no cost, scaling based on ''Hijack's'' rank and his own [[Champion statistic|statistics]].

All ''Hijacked'' ultimates and abilities that do not scale with {{as|{{sti|ability power}}}} have their {{as|{{sti|attack damage}}}} ratios converted to {{as|ability power}} ratios, scaling with {{as|{{fd|0.6}}% AP}} per {{as|1% '''total''' AD}}, and {{as|{{fd|0.4}}% AP}} per {{as|1% '''bonus''' AD}} respectively.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sylas launches his chains towards the target enemy champion to gain a copy of their champion ability. Sylas cannot select the same champion again for a set duration, and can hold the hijacked ultimate for 90 seconds, during which he can recast Hijack.
Recast: Sylas can cast his hijacked ultimate ability at no cost, scaling based on Hijack's rank and his own Champion statistic.
All Hijacked ultimates and abilities that do not scale with ability power have their attack damage ratios converted to ability power ratios, scaling with 0.6% AP per 1% total AD, and 0.4% AP per 1% bonus AD respectively.
r1.notes:
* If '''Sylas''' casts ''Hijack'' on a {{tip|clone}}, no ultimate is stolen and the ability will be placed on full cooldown.
** This does not occur with {{cai|Glory in Death|Sion}}, since he is a {{tip|zombie state|zombie}} instead.
* If the target {{tip|death|dies}}, becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, or '''Sylas''' loses {{tip|sight}} of them during ''Hijack's'' cast time, the ability cancels and does not go on cooldown or expend {{sti|{{as|mana}}}}.
** If the same happens when casting an on-target stolen ability, the ability will instead cancel and go on cooldown.
* If ''Hijack'' is intercepted by {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}}, '''Sylas''' will gain a copy of {{ai|R|Braum}} instead and an on-target cooldown will be applied to him.
** If {{ci|Braum}} has an on-target cooldown on him (by being previously ''Hijacked'') upon interception, no ultimate will be stolen.
* Since the copied ability scales based on ''Hijack's'' rank, abilities can be copied regardless of their rank.
* ''Hijack'' will copy all components of the ability: their passives and actives as well as recast effects. ''Hijack'' will not trigger the effects of other abilities unless absolutely necessary. 
* Shape-shifting ultimates will transform '''Sylas''' into the target's alternate form, replacing his basic abilities and '''base''' stats. Namely: {{ai|Aspect of the Cougar|Nidalee|Cougar Form}}, {{ai|Spider Form|Elise}}, {{ai|Transform Mercury Cannon|Jayce|Cannon Form}} and {{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}}.
** ''Dragon's Descent'' refreshes '''Sylas's''' {{tip|mana}}, depleting it and regenerating it at the same rate ''Shyvana's'' {{tip|fury}} would. Other sources of {{as|mana restoration}} will extend the duration as well. At the end of the effect, '''Sylas''' gains his previous mana. 
** Permanent transformations last for ~5 minutes or until toggled off. 
** The alternate abilities of transforming champions will cost mana and scale with the ranks as appropriate for the ability (e.g. ranks in R for Nidalee and ranks in Q/W/E for Jayce/Elise).
** Upon transforming, a {{ai|Petricite Burst|Sylas}} stack will be deducted.
** {{ai|Petricite Burst|Sylas}} stacks will still be gained from abilities cast in alternate forms, but the stacks are gained independently from the normal ones.
*** If '''Sylas''' has both normal and transformed stacks, ''Petricite Burst'' will prioritize consuming '''Sylas''' stacks before the transformed ones.
* Ultimates comply with {{tip|One for All}} rules if an ally is playing the hijacked champion. For example, an allied {{cai|Hemorrhage|Darius}} stacks will increase the damage of the hijacked {{ai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}}; or an allied {{cai|Dark Sphere|Syndra}} will add extra damage to hijacked {{ai|Unleashed Power|Syndra}} as well as producing 3 spheres that she can use.
;Interactions
* {{cai|Curse of the Sad Mummy|Amumu}} - Does not apply {{ai|Cursed Touch|Amumu}}.
* {{cai|Moonlight Vigil|Aphelios}} - Based on the {{ai|The Hitman and the Seer|Aphelios|main weapon}} at the moment of steal. {{ai|Crescendum|Aphelios}} empowers his basic attacks temporarily.
** {{ai|Calibrum|Aphelios}} does not apply marks.
* {{cai|Pyroclasm|Brand}} - Does not apply stacks of {{ai|Blaze|Brand}}.
* {{cai|Feast|Cho'Gath}} - Gains permanent ''Feast'' stacks on-kill.
* {{cai|Missile Barrage|Corki}} - Gains max charges. 
* {{cai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}} - Does not apply a stack of {{ai|Hemorrhage|Darius}}.
* {{cai|Grand Challenge|Fiora}} - Gains movement speed in the effect and can trigger the area healing, but {{ai|Duelist's Dance|Fiora|Vitals}} do not deal bonus damage.
* {{cai|Hero's Entrance|Galio}} - Gives '''Sylas''' and allies {{ai|Shield of Durand 2|Galio|Shield of Durand's}} magic {{tip|shield}}.
* {{cai|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank}} - Does not steal cannon upgrades.
* {{cai|GNAR!|Gnar}} - Gains a usable ultimate regardless of cast on {{ci|Gnar|Mini Gnar}} or {{ci|Mega Gnar}}.
* {{cai|UPGRADE!!!|Heimerdinger}} - '''Sylas's''' basic abilities are replaced with ''Heimerdinger's'' empowered abilities. The upgrade buff lasts until the ultimate can be stolen again.
* {{cai|Leap of Faith|Illaoi}} - Does not reduce {{sti|cooldown}} of {{ai|Kingslayer|Sylas}}.
* {{cai|Vanguard's Edge|Irelia}} - Applies marks of {{ai|Bladesurge|Irelia}}.
* {{cai|Riftwalk|Kassadin}} - Only provides one use.
* {{cai|Killer Instinct|Kai'Sa}} - '''Sylas'''' basic attacks, {{ai|Abduct|Sylas}} and nearby allies' {{tip|immobilize|immobilizations}} apply stacks of {{ai|Second Skin|Kai'Sa|Plasma}}, up to 4. '''Sylas''' is unable to apply the 5th stack necessary to expunge the stacks.
* {{cai|Fate's Call|Kalista}} - Only castable with a {{ii|Black Spear|link}} (purchasable in the [[Shop]] for {{g|0 gold}}).
* {{cai|Mantra|Karma}} - '''Sylas's''' basic abilities are replaced with ''Karma's'' empowered abilities.
* {{cai|Umbral Trespass|Kayn}} - Based on current form ({{ci|Shadow Assassin}}/{{ci|Rhaast}}).
* {{cai|Void Assault|Kha'Zix}} - Can steal the ability's {{ai|Evolved Adaptive Cloaking|Kha'Zix|evolution}} bonus effects.
* {{cai|Slicing Maelstrom|Kennen}} - Applies {{ai|Mark of the Storm|Kennen}}.
* {{cai|Chaaaaaaaarge!!!|Kled}} - Does not need {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|mount}} to cast.
* {{cai|Living Artillery|Kog'Maw}} - Only provides one use.
* {{cai|Mimic|LeBlanc}} - Uses the empowered version of {{ci|LeBlanc|LeBlanc's}} last cast basic ability. If she has not cast any spells, {{ai|Mimic Sigil of Malice|LeBlanc}} is copied.
* {{cai|Solar Flare|Leona}} - Does not apply {{ai|Sunlight|Leona}}.
* {{cai|Lilting Lullaby|Lillia}} - '''Sylas's''' abilities apply {{ais|Dream-Laden Bough|Lillia}} mark but not the damage.
* {{cai|Highlander|Master Yi}} - Kills do not reduce basic ability cooldowns.
* {{cai|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}} - Can join the ''dimension'' of outgoing realms if cast in the proper range ''(does not extend their duration)''.
* {{cai|Fury of the Sands|Nasus}} - Does not reduce {{sti|cooldown}} of {{ai|Chain Lash|Sylas}}.
* {{cai|Command: Shockwave|Orianna}} - Cast on self without a {{ai|Clockwork Windup|Orianna|ball}}.
* {{cai|Thrill of the Hunt|Rengar}} - '''Sylas''' will gain {{ai|Unseen Predator|Rengar}} on his next attack.
* {{cai|Void Rush|Rek'Sai}} - '''Sylas's''' attacks against enemy champions will apply a {{ai|Void Rush Mark|Rek'Sai|mark}} which can be used to cast the ability.
* {{cai|Inferno Trigger|Samira}} - Can use without a {{ai|Daredevil Impulse|Samira|Grade}}.
* {{cai|Hijack|Sylas}} - Steals the ability that the enemy '''Sylas''' has stolen. Cannot be targeted if no ability has been stolen.
* {{cai|Unleashed Power|Syndra}} - Throws a minimum of 3 {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra|spheres}}, which are left on the ground afterwards and vanish after 6 seconds.
* {{cai|Shadow Assault|Talon}} - Does not apply {{ai|Blade's End|Talon}}.
* {{cai|Noxious Trap|Teemo}} - Gains max charges.
* {{cai|Buster Shot|Tristana}} - Always has 525 cast range as '''Sylas''' does not benefit from {{ais|Draw a Bead|Tristana}} per-level cast range increase.
* {{cai|Spray and Pray|Twitch}} - Gains 300 attack range and his attacks produce missiles that travel 850 range. These attacks are classified as {{tip|melee}}, and so will trigger effects such as {{ii|Tiamat}} versus all hit targets.
* {{ci|Udyr}} - Steals {{ai|Phoenix Stance|Udyr}}. Lasts for 2 empowered attacks. 
* {{cai|Chain of Corruption|Varus}} - Does not apply stacks of {{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}}.
* {{cai|Final Hour|Vayne}} - Gains the {{as|AD}} and {{as|MS}} bonuses. Additionally, '''Sylas''' gains {{tip|invisibility}} when he casts {{ai|Chain Lash|Sylas}}. 
* {{cai|Life Form Disintegration Ray|Vel'Koz}} - Does not apply {{ai|Organic Deconstruction|Vel'Koz}}.
* {{cai|Chaos Storm|Viktor}} - Can steal the ability's {{ai|Augment- Perfect Storm|Viktor|evolution}} bonus effects.
* {{cai|Featherstorm|Xayah}} - {{ai|Clean Cuts|Xayah|Feathers}} do not interact with an ally or enemy {{ci|Xayah}}.
* {{cai|Last Breath|Yasuo}} - {{tip|Critical strike|Critical strikes}} ignore 50% of the target's {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} after activation.
* {{cai|Death Mark|Zed}} - [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' does not mimic spells but can be reactivated to {{ai|Death Mark 2|Zed|swap}} places.
* {{cai|Let's Bounce!|Zac}} - Cannot declare attacks nor use any abilities nor while bouncing. Drops {{ai|Cell Division|Zac|chunks}} that can be interacted with but do not restore health to '''Sylas'''.
